title: Hollyoaks' Rory Douglas-Speed admits tiredness is worth it as he poses with adorable son

Hollyoaks star Rory Douglas-Speed say he's never been so tired after welcoming his baby boy - but it's all worth it.

The actor and his girlfriend, co-star Nadine Mulkerrin, returned home last week with their newborn Rory.

Rory, 27, showed how much he's embracing his new life as a dad with an adorable picture.

He lies in bed topless with little Reggie sleeping soundly on his chest.

The adorable baby's face is smushed up against his dad in the super cute picture.

Posting it to Instagram , Rory captioned it: "Never had such big bags under my eyes, but it’s all worth it! #prouddadspam"

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

"Beautiful," pal Gary Lucy said.

One fan told him: "Omg so so pleased for you and Nadine Reggie is gorgeous. Enjoy every second"

Another commented: "He’s so perfect"

"So happy for you two," said another.

(Image: @nadinemulkerrin/Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Rory and Nadine, 26, welcomed little Reggie on October 15.

Rory broke the news with an excited post, sharing the first picture of his new arrival being cradled in Nadine's arms.

"Welcome to the family wee Reggie Speed 15.8.19," he wrote.

"We love You man. So proud of Nadine, I didn't think I could love her anymore but my heart is bloody bursting! She was amazing throughout her labour. Women are seriously Superhuman x."

The happy couple, who met on the set of the Channel 4 soap, got engaged last December after dating for a year.

(Image: David Fisher/ITV/REX)

And she revealed she was expecting when she showed off her bump on the red carpet of the British Soap Awards this year.

Their characters - Joel Dexter and Cleo McQueen - got married themselves on Hollyoaks, and Rory followed suit months later with his own proposal.
